Training workshop entitled (Basics of growing house plants)
14  February,  2024
In partnership with Plaza Hollandi, the official sponsor of the agricultural project, Best Buddies Qatar  organized a training workshop  entitled (The Basics of Growing Indoor Houseplants), and 25 members of the Citizen chapter, accompanied by members of their families, participated in the training workshop, where the workshop focused on providing the affiliates with basic skills in methods of growing basic houseplants in preparation for enabling them to manage a small agricultural investment project at the end of the training workshops.
